casebody.data:
POTTLE, et al.
v.
LINK, et al. No. 27PA08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Ryal W. Tayloe, Wilmington, for Pottle, et al. G. Grady Richardson, Jr., Sidney S. Eagles, Jr., Elizabeth Brooks Scherer, Raleigh, for Link and Willetts. Matthew D. Rhoad, Andrea B. Short, Raleigh, for CP&L, et al. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of February 2008 by Duke Energy Carolinas, LLC for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief: "Motion Allowed. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008." MARTIN, J., recused.
